page.title: 07Confectionery Making:FINTRY
page.content:
I make tablet in my workshop (the old farm bothy), helped by two ladies from the village.
It was originally made for sale in the milk bar, when it opened in 1956. It now sells throughout Scotland.
Tablet is a Scottish speciality, (akin to fudge) and although recipes differ, the ingredients are much the same - { sugar, condensed milk, butter { milk, syrup and vanilla essence.} Our{recipe is one my mother used.} The strange name{tablet}can only describe the shape in which it is sold.
We opened{Scotland's 1st farm milkbar. It very soon became a village feature, but the modifications necessary to meet new EEC regulations led it to close in 1982.
